intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Dr Huang Clinic collects, uses, and protects your information when you visit our website or contact our clinic.
title: Privacy Policy

sections.body: We may collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email, phone number, and message details when you contact us or request an appointment.
bullets: Messages submitted through forms or email
Basic usage data (pages visited and device type)
sections.heading: Information We Collect

sections.body: We use your information to respond to inquiries, schedule appointments, and improve our services. We do not sell your personal information.
bullets: Improve site content and user experience
sections.heading: How We Use Your Information

sections.body: We only share information when required to deliver services or comply with legal obligations. We do not share personal information for marketing by third parties.
sections.heading: Sharing

sections.body: You may request updates or deletion of your contact information by contacting the clinic. We will respond within a reasonable timeframe.
sections.heading: Your Choices

sections.body: If you have questions about this policy, please contact our clinic directly.
sections.heading: Contact
